name: cosmichub
description: A comprehensive astrology and spiritual guidance platform with multi-system chart calculations

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:astro" "npm run dev:healwave"
scripts.build: npm run build:astro && npm run build:healwave
scripts.test: npm run test:astro && npm run test:healwave && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:astro && npm run lint:healwave && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:astro && npm run format:healwave && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:astro && npm run type-check:healwave
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend/astro && npm install && cd ../healwave && npm install && cd ../../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:astro && npm run clean:healwave && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf .pytest_cache
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run npm run install:all to install all dependencies'

author: CosmicHub Team
